title: Smoked aubergines with garlic (mirza ghasemi)
description: A great Persian dish of soft roasted aubergine in tomato and garlic sauce, with eggs cooked into it at the last minute. Ideal for making as part of a mezze meal.Each serving provides 241kcal, 9g protein, 10g carbohydrate (of which 8g sugars), 17g fat (of which 2g saturates), 7g fibre and 1.6g salt.
ingredients: vegetable or olive oil, for frying
1 bulb garlic, cloves peeled and thinly sliced
small handful of broken walnut pieces, to garnish
